scripts.posttest: istanbul report --root coverage text-summary && istanbul check-coverage --lines 95 --statements 95 --branches 95 --functions 95

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage:
%s
NOTE: Please see angular's commit message guidelines (https://github.com/angular/angular.js/blob/master/DEVELOPERS.md#commits) for information on how to format commit messages.

As an example, here is a valid commit message: 'docs(slider): Document slider public api'

If this commit is on a development / WIP branch, you can disable this by running `git commit --no-verify`.
